segments.text: I sent my resume to a computer company and am waiting for their call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pineapple Computer Company . A secretary is needed there , and it is worth a try . Do you get any information or advertisement for employment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep ! I got some , in which I am interested . But ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But what ? You always act like this , when you face difficulties .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All the fears are nothing . You can make it . There is no other choice for you . Be brave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Seemingly there is no turning back . I have to face it somehow .
segments.speaker: S1
